source.sqlReaderQuery:
-- SelectionEndpoints, 28sec, pre, sada wcus: 45sec 
SELECT DISTINCT
	   substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	   [SubscriptionId_DT_String] as SubId,
       [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwConfigurations/Parquet/*.0000000.parquet',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200)
)
as [a]
WHERE 
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] = 'Worker.VDW.Frontend' and 
	[ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%' and 
	datediff(day,cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime), convert(date,getutcdate())) <= (6*7 + 1) and -- 6 weeks + day cosmos delay
	cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime) > '2020-05-10' -- LogicalServerName is not hashed after this date
